revision.text: repeated measure design PMID: 10959922.J Biopharm Stat. 2000 Aug;10(3):433-45.Equivalence in test assay method comparisons for the repeated-measure, matched-pair design in medical device studies: statistical considerations. Une conception d'étude qui utilise les mêmes personnes et les expose à un ensemble de conditions. L'effet de l'ordre et de la pratique peut être un facteur de confusion dans ces conceptions a study design which use the same individuals and exposure them to a set of conditions. The effect of order and practice can be confounding factor in such designs Jean-Marc Meunier PlanAndPlannedProcess Branch http://www.holah.karoo.net/experimentaldesigns.htm
